reviewText: Excellent compilation of the master detective Poirot. If you are a Poirot fan this set is a good addition to your dvd library. David Suchet is Poirot and this series will be greatly missed.
How can you not love Poirot?
Still need to watch the rest of films.  David Suchet would sure be a joy to have for dinner.

Wonderful  that Acorn has released this nice roundup of faves handy on three discs. Of course Orient Express is the classic, but Poirot's Christmas is enjoyable any time of year, the Affair at Styles brings Hastings to the fore, and The Egyptian Tomb offers a different view of Poirot's sleuthing skills. David Suchet is brilliant, warm, droll and perfect--no one else could portray our Belgian detective as well. Treat yourself to a welcome return to some of his most memorable cases and most clever investigation!
Longtime fan. Always. Thank you. Respectfully, Janice M. Fisher
Wonderful . I am never disappointed in poirot. And delivery is very quick. Marvelous.
My husband is a big Poirot fan and said the DVD was excellent.
Worth watching again and again because of David Suchet and Agatha.
excellent acting and plot line which many things lack now days. David Suchet is excellent in this roll and the supporting cast is top notch.
With the exception of Murder on the Orient Express which was great, most of this set contains older episodes and I just didn't think they were as good as some others I've seen.
Nice selection from the series.  It left me wanting more.  Maybe another purchase . . .
Great DVD!!!
a Christie fan collection is right on the ball..  Great entertainment
glad to have it!
Great story
Excellent service-thank you!
love it!
Can't get any better than A Christie and David Suchet !!
Any of Poirot's collections are excellent.  Agatha Christie was an excellent mystery writer.
I am an Agatha Christi Fan
great

I'll be sixty-nine years old, next year... Great priced, nice idea.
I bought this ''' FAN FAVORITES COLLECTION ''', along with
Agatha Christie's "MRS MARPLE".
One of these, two, series had something like 14 seasons.
Maybe one of these samplers will convince me to buy MORE.
Believe it or not, I've NOT seen either of these BBC programs.
At this price, I'll be able to see what I've been missing...
